skills.name: Love is War!
skills.description: [SP: 16][CD: 18s] Throw an open umbrella forward to scatter ice crystals in all directions, dealing 24*30.0% ATK of Ice DMG to enemies  in a large AOE and slowing their Attack and Move Speeds by 40% for 5.00s.

skills.name: Our Pact
skills.description: Attacks gain 20.0% Physical DMG against slowed enemies. When Combo Hit Count exceeds 50, gain 20.0% Total DMG Multiplier.
